mapper.select: select * from image where exists (select * from (select id from apps order by updateTime desc limit #{start},#{offset} ) as c where appId=c.id) order by appId desc;

select * from image where exists (select * from (select distinct apps.id from apps left join app_category on apps.id=app_category.appId where app_category.categoryId=#{id} order by updateTime desc limit #{start},#{offset} ) as c where image.appId=c.id) order by appId desc;
